answers.answer: In orfer to be able to take care of your baby, you have to take care of yourself first.

question: I have a 3 and half month old baby. I have been recently diagnosed with T2 Diabetes, hypertension, high cholestrol and Thyroid disorder (very low TSH). My doc has prescribed me medicine, but I will have to stop breastfeeding as a consequence. I havent started the medication because of this. What to do.
title: Lactating mother
